name: VirZOOM Gamepad Emulator
description: A tool that allows the VirZOOM bike controller to act like a normal gamepad for other games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD 290 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 MB available space
